    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User​(java.lang.String nickname,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String surname,
            int age,
            java.lang.String email,
            boolean isPremium,
            java.lang.String path,
            java.lang.String hobbies)
        This constructor is for creating the user, it is not for setting the visual profile page
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the user
        password - password of the user
        name - name of the user
        surname - surname of the user
        age - age of the user
        email - email of the user
        isPremium - represents if the user is premium
        path - path of the profile photo-optional
        hobbies - hobbies of the user-optional

      • User

        This constructor for instansiating the profile page of a user
        Parameters:
        currentUser - logged in user

      • follow

        public void follow​(User other)

        follows the given user. Adds the given user to following list of the current user

        and adds the current user to follower list of the given user

        Parameters:
        other - followed user

      • unfollow

        public void unfollow​(User other)

        unfollows the given user. Removes the given user from following list of the current user

        and removes the current user from follower list of the given user

        Parameters:
        other - unfollowed user

      • joinGroup

        public void joinGroup​(GroupPage group)

        joins the given group

        adds given group to group list of the current user

        adds current user to user list of the given group

        Parameters:
        group - joined group

      • leaveGroup

        public void leaveGroup​(GroupPage group)

        leaves from the given group

        removes given group from the group list of the current user

        removes current user from the user list of the given group

        Parameters:
        group - leaved group
